diff_hunk:
@@ -66,23 +66,22 @@ build:gdr --define=with_gdr_support=true
 build:ngraph --define=with_ngraph_support=true
 build:verbs --define=with_verbs_support=true
 
+
 build --define=use_fast_cpp_protos=true
 build --define=allow_oversize_protos=true
 build --define=grpc_no_ares=true
 
-build --spawn_strategy=standalone
-build --genrule_strategy=standalone
-build -c opt
+
+#build --spawn_strategy=standalone
body:
When I remove `build -c opt` line from my bazelrc, this is what I see in subcommands:
```
/usr/bin/gcc -U_FORTIFY_SOURCE -fstack-protector -Wall -B/usr/bin -B/usr/bin -Wunused-but-set-parameter -Wno-free-nonheap-object -fno-omit-frame-pointer -MD -MF ...
```
So I do not think it defaults to -c opt`

So I do not think it defaults to -c opt`
body_text:
When I remove build -c opt line from my bazelrc, this is what I see in subcommands:
/usr/bin/gcc -U_FORTIFY_SOURCE -fstack-protector -Wall -B/usr/bin -B/usr/bin -Wunused-but-set-parameter -Wno-free-nonheap-object -fno-omit-frame-pointer -MD -MF ...

So I do not think it defaults to -c opt`
